Text: The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide a Data Pool component as an extension of the Base Component
The Data Pool Component shall support the adaptation points specified in table \ref{tab:AP-DP}
When it is configured, the Data Pool Component shall provide operations to let other components access the current value of its data items
When it is configured, the Data Pool Component shall provide operations to let other components update the current value of its data items
Deleted
An application shall instantiate the Data Pool Component only once
An application shall extend the Data Pool Execution Procedure to refresh all data items in the data pool which are not refreshed by other means
Components encapsulating a command or a report shall implement all attributes defined for them by the PUS
Components encapsulating a command or a report shall provide operations to access in read and write mode all their PUS-defined attributes
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide operations to encode and decode any PUS-defined attribute in a packet carrying a command or report
If an application sends commands or reports to the same destination with different APIDs, then for each such APID, a CORDET Group shall be defined
If an application receives commands or reports from the same source  with different APIDs, then for each such APID, a CORDET group shall be defined
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide an InFactory component capable of creating an instance of any of the command or report types defined by the framework
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide an OutFactory component capable of creating an instance of any of the command or report types defined by the framework
The two factory components shall maintain and make accessible through the data pool the observables listed in table \ref{tab:Obs-FAC}
The InCommand components provided by the PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall close the InCommand adaptation points as stated in table \ref{tab:AP-OCM}
The OutComponent components provided by the PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as stated in table \ref{tab:AP-ICM}
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the OutComponent, a ReqVerRep component to encapsulate a service 1 report
The ReqVerRep component shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S1-A}
The service 1 implementation of the PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall close or override the InLoader and InCommand adaptation points listed in table \ref{tab:AP-S1}
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall maintain and make accessible through the data pool the observables listed in table \ref{tab:Obs-S1}
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall support the service 1 failure codes listed in table \ref{tab:reqVerFailCodes}

If an application performs a verification check for a command and the check fails, it shall update the Verification Failure Data in the data pool with either zero or with a command-specific failure data item
Applications shall be responsible for configuring the OutRegistry component to selectively disable failure verification reports which they do not need
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall implement a Report Definition List (RDL) consisting of HK\_N\_REP\_DEF Report Definitions with the fields defined in table \ref{tab:repDefDataStruct}

The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall implement HK\_N\_SAMPLE\_BUF Sampling Buffers capable of holding the values of the super-commutated data items for a given housekeeping/diagnostic report
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide a Sampling Buffer Configuration Function to configure a sampling buffer for a given report
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide a Sampling Buffer Setter Function to load a data item value in a sampling buffer
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide a Sampling Buffer Getter Function to retrieve a data item value from a sampling buffer
Application shall be responsible for loading a sampling buffer with the values of super-commutated data items
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, a hkCreateCmd component to encapsulate a (3,1) or (3,2) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, a hkDeleteCmd component to encapsulate a (3,3) or (3,4) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, a hkEnableCmd component to encapsulate a (3,5) or (3,7) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, a hkDisableCmd component to encapsulate a (3,6) or (3,8) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, a hkRepStructCmd component to encapsulate a (3,9) or (3,11) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the OutComponent, a hkRepStructRep component to encapsulate a (3,10) or (3,12) report
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the OutComponent, a hkRep component to encapsulate a periodic (3,25) or (3,26) report
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the OutComponent, a hkRepOneShot component to encapsulate a one-shot (3,25) or (3,26) report
The hkCreateCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S3-1}
The hkDeleteCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S3-3}
The hkEnableCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S3-5}
The hkDisableCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S3-6}
The hkRepStructCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S3-9}
The hkRepStructRep component shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S3-10}
The hkRep component shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S3-25}
The hkRepOneShot component shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S3-25s}
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall maintain and make accessible through the data pool the observables listed in table \ref{tab:Obs-S3}
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall maintain and make accessible through the data pool the parameters listed in table \ref{tab:Par-S3}
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the OutComponent, an EvtRep component to encapsulate an event report of type (5,1) to (5,4)
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, an EvtEnableCmd component to encapsulate a (5,5) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, an EvtDisableCmd component to encapsulate a (5,6) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, an EvtRepDisabledCmd component to encapsulate a (5,7) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the OutComponent, an EvtRepDisabledRep component to encapsulate a (5,8) report
The EvtRep component shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S5-1}
The EvtEnableCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S5-5}
The EvtDisableCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S5-6}
The EvtRepDisabledCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S5-7}
The EvtRepDisabledRep component shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S5-8}
Applications shall be responsible for configuring the EvtRep component with the event parameters at the point where the EvtRep component is created
Applications shall be responsible for configuring the OutRegistry component to selectively disable event reports whose default enable status is: 'disabled'

For each event report it pre-defines, the PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide an Event Generation Function which takes as parameters the event type, subtype, discriminant and the event parameters
The Event Generation Function shall: retrieve an OutComponent to encapsulate the event report from the OutFactory, configure with its parameters and load it in the OutLoader
If the OutComponent retrieval from the OutFactory fails, the Event Generation Function shall generate an error report of type OUTFACTORY\_FAIL
The part size or destination of a large packet transfer shall not be updated while a transfer is under way
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, an AreYouAliveCmd component to encapsulate a (17,1) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the OutComponent, an AreYouAliveRep component to encapsulate a (17,2) report
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the InCommand, an OnBoardConnectCmd component to encapsulate a (17,3) command
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall provide, as an extension of the OutComponent, an OnBoardConnectCmd component to encapsulate a (17,4) report
The AreYouAliveCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S17-1}
The AreYouAliveRep component shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S17-2}
The OnBoardConnectCmd component shall close the InCommand adaptation points as indicated in table \ref{tab:CR-S17-3}
The OnBoardConnectRep component shall close the OutComponent adaptation points as indicatedin table \ref{tab:CR-S17-4}
An application shall not be sent a (17,3) command before execution of the previous (17,3) command has completed
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall maintain and make accessible through the data pool the observables listed in table \ref{tab:Obs-S17}
The PUS Extension of the CORDET Framework shall maintain and make accessible through the data pool the parameters listed in table \ref{tab:Obs-S17}
